meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Robert Wood Malavika Jagannathan Stew Latwin Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7317.

td.p: Robert Wood, a teacher originally from Twentynine Palms, California
Malavika Jagannathan, a marketing writer from Seattle, Washington
Stew Latwin, a Navy pilot originally from Rye, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $13,400)

tr.td: HALL OF FAME CATCHERS
(Alex: We're talking about baseball.)
ABBREV.
A STATE OF WAR
(Alex: You have to identify the U.S. state for us.)
A LITTLE BIT OF EVERYTHING
"BEAUTY"
THE BEAST
